contentEncoded:
Talk about a blast from the past! Remember that time when 80,000 people turned out to see a bunch of crazy people with crazy flying machines try to “fly” a few hundred feet into the nasty Cumberland River? That shining moment in Nashville’s history where we actually broke the U.S. record for the biggest Flugtag crowd EVER? Maybe you weren’t here in 2007, and that’s why we’re thrilled to share this photo by 00accord4cyl that reminds us of one of our favorite days in Nashville.
